name: Release 1.0.0
body:
- Added basic functionality to the OS: filesystem, windows, folders, control strip, header buttons and context menus.
  - Although most context menu options are disabled, their functionality can be added in a future if necessary.
  - Most programs have a "About X" showing some information about copyright.
- Added bootup animation.
- Added Arkanoid, Asteroids and Galactic Plague as C++ game ports.
- Added Terminal with some commands and two games (car and tunnel).
- Added Navigator, with the ability to show some webpages (if not limited by GitHub), and Ã‘RPG webgame.
- Added Acrobat Reader, with the ability to open and show PDF files.
- Added two Steam pages: games (gathers all games, including some webpages to non-ported games); and news, which shows this list.
  - This list is shown by fetching the release data via GitHub workflows whenever a release is done.
- Added some folders with some info about the web and me.
